# scaleway_cockpit_token (Resource)

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the token

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `secret_key` (String, Sensitive) The secret key of the token
